name: Boterkoek (Dutch Butter Cake)
author: COOKS2MUCH
summary: Delicious, authentic Dutch butter cake.  This cake is moist with a great almond flavor - a favorite in most Dutch households!
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease two 8 inch round cake pans, or 9 inch pie plates
In a large bowl, use an electric mixer to beat butter and sugar until light and fluffy
Add eggs, reserving just enough to brush over the tops, about 1 tablespoon
Combine the flour and baking powder; stir into the batter by hand using a sturdy spoon
Press evenly into the two prepared pans
Press almond halves into the top where each slice would be
Brush the tops with a thin layer of the reserved egg
Bake in the preheated oven for about 30 minutes, or until the top is golden brown
